channel.title: SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Template_Rule on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Template_Rule on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Template_Rule
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Template_Rule Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Component_Firewall_Rule type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer firewall template rule. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Component Firewall]] service to view current rules. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Firewall Update Request]] service to submit a firewall update request. Local action The action that this template rule is to take [permit or deny]. Type: string destinationIpAddress The destination IP address considered for determining rule application.
